findings.title: Simplify accounting and better handle remainders
findings.description: Reworked accounting to simplify and better handle remainders.

findings.title: Document assumptions about ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The contract makes assumptions about ERC20 tokens that should be documented, including token balances not being too big or small and the ability to compute total received tokens.

findings.title: Consider checking adapter existence in MetaSwap
findings.description: MetaSwap doesn't check that an adapter exists before calling into Spender.
